content: Participants needs to mandatorily join the Happy Rise (HARI)  Telegram Group  Â and  Bounty Group . Participants needs to stay in the Group til the end of the campaign, leaving in the middle of the campaign will lead to the banning of the participants along with not receiving any of the stakes for the following weeks.You need to join the telegram group if we checked and you didn't join telegram group we have the rights to kick you out of the campaign without any payment.Join telegram group first before applying, NOT after applying. If we check that you didn't join the telegram group upon filling up the form you will not be accepted.Weâ€™ve the right to remove you from the campaign during any point of time if we think that you are indulged in cheating the campaign with multi-accounts or spanning the forum.Using multi-accounts to join the campaign, cheating or spamming is not allowed and doing so will result in disqualification. Red-trusted accounts are not allowed to join the campaign.You wonâ€™t receive stakes if you have been inactive for 2 weeks.Before Join Make ''Proof Of Authentication'' Post We have the right to change the General Rules. By applying to this campaign, you accept to all the terms and conditions of this campaign.Bounty Related Questions not allowed main Telegram Group if you ask any question you will be banned from this campaign  [/list][/list]Code:[b]Proof Of Registration[/b]Bitcointalk Username :Bitcointalk Profile Link : Telegram Username :BSC/ERC-20 Address : Every participant must follow the  Happy Rise (HARI) Twitter AccountTwitter account must have at least 300 followers with 90% real followers while checked through Twitter Audit.You must make at least 2 tweets and 5 retweets per week about Happy Rise (HARI)You must make only 1 tweet, retweet per day.Make a report weekly to receive stakes.Use these hashtags for making tweets and retweets Â #Happy Rise #HARI #cryptocurrency #nft #BTC_Mouses #metaverse #BSC #ICO #lottery #coin #tokenSTAKES300+ Followers - 1 Stakes/week1500+ Followers - 3 Stakes/week4000+ Followers - 5 Stakes/week10000+ Followers - 7 Stakes/week REGISTRATION FORUM Every participant must follow the  Happy Rise (HARI) Facebook AccountFacbook account must have at least 300 FriendsYou must make at least 2 Posts and 5 Reposts per week about HARIYou must make only 1 Posts, Reposts per day.Make a report weekly to receive stakes.Use these hashtags for making Posts and Reposts #Happy Rise #HARI #cryptocurrency #nft #BTC_Mouses #metaverse #BSC #ICO #lottery #coin #tokenSTAKES300+ Friends - 1 Stakes/week1500+ Friends - 3 Stakes/week4000+ Friends - 5 Stakes/week10000+ Friends - 7 Stakes/week REGISTRATION FORUM Your Reddit account must have at least 100+ Karma to participate.Make 5 posts per week about Happy Rise (HARI)Only 1 post per day. Make a report weekly to receive stakesUse these hashtags for making posts Â #Happy Rise #HARI #cryptocurrency #nft #BTC_Mouses #metaverse #BSC #ICO #lottery #coin #tokenSTAKES100+ Karma - 1 Stakes/week500+ Karma - 3 Stakes/week1000+ Karma - 5 Stakes/week REGISTRATION FORUM Every participant must be Join  Happy Rise (HARI) Discord GroupCreate 5 posts Discord Group About Happy RiseDo not make more than two posts per daySTAKES5 Post - 5 Stakes/week REGISTRATION FORUMEvery participant must be Join  Happy Rise (HARI) Telegram GroupUpdate your Telegram name to "Your Name | Happy Rise''. Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name. Replace your profile picture with   Happy Rise Logo.Create 5 posts Other Crypto Releted GroupDo not make more than two posts per daySTAKES5 Post - 5 Stakes/week REGISTRATION FORUMDisclaimer : Â I am only the Bounty Campaign Manager for this project. I will not be held responsible Bounty Payment. Its responsible by Happy Rise (HARI) Â Team you can join your own risk.[/list]
